links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..995
Index entries for sequences related to Artin's conjecture
mathematica: digits = 105; m0 = 1000; dm = 100; Clear[s]; r[n_] := -1 + Fibonacci[n-1] + Fibonacci[n+1]; s[m_] := s[m] = NSum[-r[n] PrimeZetaP[n]/n, {n, 2, m}, NSumTerms -> m0, WorkingPrecision -> 400] // Exp; s[m0]; s[m = m0 + dm]; While[RealDigits[s[m], 10, digits][[1]] != RealDigits[s[m - dm], 10, digits][[1]], Print[m]; m = m + dm]; A = s[m]; ContinuedFraction[A, 93] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 15 2016 *)
author: _Fred Lunnon_ and _Simon Plouffe_, Dec 11 1999
